description: We need a mechanism to download data from Supabase and save it into the local db. "Create a Client Component hook hooks/useOfflineSync.ts. Logic:Use useEffect to run this code once when the component loads.Import createClient from @/lib/supabase/client and db from @/lib/db. Fetch data from Supabase:Query products table.Query inventory_lots table where status is 'available'.Save data locally:Use db.products.bulkPut(supabaseProducts).Use db.inventory_lots.bulkPut(supabaseLots).Add a boolean state isSyncing to show a loading spinner while downloading."
